name: DELTARUNE Mockup Battle Toy
description:
I wanted to test uploading assets, like PNGs/GIFs to HTML using Gamemaker Studio. Turns out it's not TOO difficult, just a bit strange. I made this toy where you can essentially make a 'mockup' fight with any picture and some text.

All music, sprites and assets belong to Toby Fox. Play DELTARUNE here!

  • (ctrl+c, ctrl+v) Replace the boss sprite by copy + pasting it in. 
  • P to upscale the enemy sprite.
  • O to downscale the enemy sprite.
  • Backspace will flip the enemy sprite.
  • Enter can be used to change the dialog.
  • Arrow Keys can be used to shift/adjust the enemy sprite.
  • R can be used to reset the enemy back to default position.
  • 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9 will play a different 'animation' on the image.
  • F1 will reset.
  • F2 will toggle pixel perfection.
  • F3 will toggle screenshake.
